About Me

I'm a full stack software engineer with experience working in a variety of environments with a number of different web-related technologies. My roles have ranged from individual contributor to manager and director at both small and large companies. I have a background in Physics and Electrical Engineering, but have spent the majority of my career developing web applications and automation scripts using JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, Perl, JSP, along with tools such as Git/GitHub, Subversion, Bugzilla, Asana, among others. I'm always open to interesting opportunities to apply and expand my skills while developing robust and efficient solutions to meet the needs of clients and business partners.
